messages.title: Why is the Green Party Different?
messages.content: We face economic, social and environmental crises. Only the Green Party has bold, innovative ideas for a sustainable economy and a fair society; is the only party with people and their environment at the core of its policies.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Place hospitals under local control, improve maternity services, restore access to free NHS dentistry, emphasise prevention of ill-health through healthier eating, exercise and a lower-stress society.
A basic pension of £170 per week, the right to work beyond the basic retirement age, free home insulation, free personal and nursing care for the elderly and infirm.
Support transition to a one planet, fair economy with hundreds of thousands of jobs in manufacturing, design, building and engineering in sectors such as renewable energy.

Free, nutritious school meals for all children, creation of 2000 Young People’s Centres nationally, free off-peak travel for under 18s in full time education, spend £1bn a year enhancing Sure Start centres.

leaflet.personalStatement: Anyone who has met Mike Shone knows he has an endless interest in people, and a passion for what he believes in most – equality and fairness.

politicalExperience.achievements: Responsible for launching the borough's kerbside recycling scheme.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Mike has lived in Stafford for 40 years. He has a daughter and three grandchildren and will be marrying his partner, Mikala at Keele University this Autumn.
